column7: Didn't have wooden teeth
Used to skip school (the little scamp)
Loved to smoke the chronic
Was the first grad student of Princeton
Liberia's capital was named after Monroe
Loved to skinny dip in the potomac - a notoriously filthy body of water
Loved to duel and teach parrots to curse
Popularized the phrase "OK"
Had a pet goat (classic W.H.H)
Shredded the violin
Promised not to seek a second term if elected
Taylor's nickname was "Old Ruff and Ready"
Married his teacher - the naughty bastard
Didn't swear his oath of office
Was a contestant on ABCs The Bachelor
Featured on WWE's Monday Night Smackdown
Was perpetually drunk (especially during his inauguration)
Got a speeding ticket on a horse...the only question is - how'd they catch him?
Banned alcohol from the White House - the prude.
could both shoot a pistol and wield a sword simultaneously (in theory - he was ambidextrous)
was a sharply dressed night owl - HOO HOO!
was a real creep (married the girl to whom he was previously a legal guardian)
was afraid of electricity - had frequent nightmares of Nicola Tesla.
had an artificial jaw
had an ipad (was tech savvy)
there is no animal he hasn't hunted...including man - the greatest game of them all. Also he had asthma.
once spilled bath water all over his constituents
thought he was really smart
lost the white house china in a poker game
loved having a slippery scalp
spoke chinese - probably a communist
basically Hugh Jackman
couldn't even sell buttons
Almost was nicknamed "Eileen"
terrible at formatting resumes.
huge balls
was a crook
too pretty for his own good
total nut
was once shot because someone loved Jodi Foster
the best Bush yet
sexy sax man
was a Cheerleader in High school - ironically most male cheerleaders found loathsome.
great at mic-drops
His tiny hands only seem large when compared to his tiny....feet.
